website_summaries.verdict: The ViewSonic PJD5134 provides solid data image quality and HDMI connectivity in a budget-priced portable projector.

customer_reviews.title: Backyard Drive-In
customer_reviews.text: I did a ton of research before deciding on this particular projector and have been extremely happy. Be aware the speakers in the projector itself are terrible but it can easily be hooked up to external speakers. We've watched several shows/movies inside projecting on a blank wall in the living room. Even at dusk when there's still decent light outside, this thing projects a bright enough image to watch. Our primary reason for purchasing this projector, however, was for an outdoor movies. It works really well for us.
customer_reviews.author: historian05

customer_reviews.title: Dependable cheap projector
customer_reviews.text: This projector works great for our church building and is a very good price for what it does. The picture is fantastic and clear and easy for most to use.The picture resolution is very good and optimal for a standard 96" projector screen. I have nothing but good things to review about this projector, as I have used mostly viewsonic and Infocus projectors in the past for their ease of use, dependability, cost and quality. If your needs are simple and need to save money on a projector for a small-medium size meeting area( about 200 people), then this is a good one. This projector also has proven well for portability and is rugged enough for travel.
customer_reviews.author: j flavors

customer_reviews.title: Lasted almost 7 years as a home theater projector
customer_reviews.text: This projector was meant to be a "starter" home theater projector. The original lamp finally quit after almost 7 years of frequent use. It has lasted longer than I thought it would, and has provided "good enough" video quality in a dark room with a screen set up on the wall. I set it to 720p mode for movies, TV, and games, which after conversion left a bit of the projected space blank, but still presented pretty well. Overall, even seven years later this is a pretty good projector if you can get it on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin P. Conti

customer_reviews.title: Definitely good for the money
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't see myself spending 600+ on a projector. But I bad bought this for my dad this past father's day to upgrade his older one from 2003. The image quality is pretty good, but don't expect 1080p from this. Don't expect crystal clear pictures because you'll be disappointed. Regardless the quality is good. The picture is very bright even in lit up rooms. One thing I didn't like is that you can see the individual pixels when up close to the screen. We used a large pull down projector screen. If your wanting theatre like picture and resolution spend a couple hundred more on one that produces a 1080p signal
customer_reviews.author: Kipp

customer_reviews.title: Family movie night favorite!! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This projector rocks! It is super bright, very quiet, and the colors and detail are very nice. We are having such a great time using it to stream movies using our Fire Stick, and have also used it with our portable DVD player, and have even hooked it up to our cable box (HDMI -HDMI port) to watch on-demand movies through cable. We have the sound going out to an amplifier and speakers for bigger sound. My husband was super impressed by this projector (despite being a skeptic initially about the whole movie night experience) and now he asks for movie nights and popcorn. What a great bonding time for our whole family.
customer_reviews.author: Aloha

customer_reviews.title: Nothing even comes close for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how much people used to/still pay for digital projectors. This is probably upper/middle road for a really great price. We have ours in the garage...live in AZ so wactching the Cardinal beat your home team is comfortable in the winter time. Anyway, this is a great projector. It's super bright in a dark room and the quality is awesome. I measured our screen (a white table cloth nailed into the wall, which nobody has noticed) and it's right at 112 inches! And crystal clear picture.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Self

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what can I say about this projector. I read the reviews before purchasing it, and it was everything others said it was. I used it to show movies outside. The picture was excellent. Used it for a small 6 ft screen and a 12 foot screen. Both pictures were incredibly clear. You can hook up the TV, DVD player, computer, flash drive, etc. It is great for presentations as well. The only drawback is the sound. The sound is not loud at all. I knew this from other reviews. I purchased a nice pair of computer speakers and it is perfect! This was by far a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia L. Wiseburn

customer_reviews.title: Great projector for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great projector for the price! Plenty bright for cloudy-day viewing (with thin window coverings, but not closed curtains or anything) at about 15 feet from the screen. Easy plug and play set-up. Picture quality is just fine for us, too. When you get close to the screen, you get the screen door effect a bit, but it's not nearly pronounced enough to bug us. We have used attached to my computer and a PS3, all via an HDMI cord, and it's been easy. We've streamed netflix, amazon prime, and played video games (GTA V only, so far) all with no problems. Have yet to try 3D, as we only have passive glasses, but we're definitely planning to do so soon.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: we decided on this projector and I am glad we did
customer_reviews.text: After a lot of research, we decided on this projector and I am glad we did. Between this projector and the 12 foot screen, we've become the envy of our neighborhood during movie nights. Many people have stopped and asked about our equipment, which we gladly tell them about. We did purchase a sound bar to go with it and we couldn't ask for a better system. Easy set up, great picture, and great sound. I'm a novice at electronics and can figure it out pretty easily when my husband is out of town. I definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Two Boys

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Little Projector
customer_reviews.text: We use this to watch movie outdoors at night. I connect it to my laptop and use a wireless speaker for sound. I was completely amazed at how easy it was to set up and start enjoying. This projector may be tiny, but the screen image is bright, clear and large! We have a 8'x15' screen, and this projector doesn't seem to strain. I actually overshot when I originally set it up, and had to move the projector closer. We've used it at least 6 times this spring, and I'm looking forward to more nights of movies under the stars.
customer_reviews.author: AJMainer

customer_reviews.title: Backyard movie awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: SO MUCH FUN to watch movies outdoors! We have loved this projector! Don't be afraid that it is more affordable than the others - this one gets the job done very well. We have no complaints. We have probably used it twenty times in the past 3 months. Lightweight (easy to port from place to place) Bright projection (we can start the movie before the sun goes down if we have youngsters with us) Easy to use (No need to read the manual, just plug and play) We plan on hosting outdoor football watching parties this fall.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Beats a TV anyday
customer_reviews.text: Who needs a TV? This thing is great, and I'm anal about image quality. I use this on a 120 inch Elite Screen at a 15 foot throw distance. This projector really goes far for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor Theatre
customer_reviews.text: We use this projector with,, andfor our outdoor theatre. This projector produces a very clear picture on the screen. We have had it a little over a year now. We have enjoyed using it for outdoor movie nights without any problems. A quality projector for the money!
customer_reviews.author: NurseB

customer_reviews.title: Works Well for Movies
customer_reviews.text: My old projector had slightly better resolution, but this one seems to have a better picture. I think because it has HDMI and my old one did not. It could also be the fact that my old one was not LCD. It isn't exceptionally quiet or loud. Pretty much in the middle. NOTE: I searched for replacement bulbs, and stuff was all really expensive. Hoping that goes down. I'd like to run 2-3 bulbs through it before I need to replace. P.S. I used my old projector a lot and got 4-5 years out of it on one replacement bulb. it then started showing dead pixels. That is the sort of lifespan I would be satisfied with.
customer_reviews.author: Cyril Figgus

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing projector for the price! Plays everything I've ever wanted to play and absolutely no trouble setting it up. Was projecting crisp, bright, huge images on my wall within 15 minutes of opening the box. Can watch it with lights on and still see the picture well. The built-in speakers are worthless, but that should not be an issue since most everyone these days have bluetooth/WiFi speakers. I just hooked up one of my bluetooth speakers to the projector with an aux cable and now have incredible sound.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Coughlin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this thing is awesome. I have it in my basement as a cheap projector on a plain white wall. It looks great and love watching the football games on it. Its not mind blowing by any means but it really gets the job done for most people. All my friends love it and talk about how good it looks. The speakers on it are ok but I would say you would want something better attached to them. It is not loud and has a power save feature that dims it down a little bit. I am very happy with it and at this price point, how could you go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Nice for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Brighter than I imagined it would be. Met my needs extremely well. I use this outside and project onto a 100 inch screen. You can see it clearly around sunset if you're watching something pretty bright. After dark the picture really looks great though! It does have a speaker. I wouldn't use it though. Buy some basic 2.1 computer speakers. I bought a set for $30 off Amazon. Worthy investment. Set up is super simple. We have a little table we leave it and the speakers on and just store it in the closet for easy access.
customer_reviews.author: WLReader

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: After seeing the good reviews on this projector, I purchased the Viewsonic from Amazon. I have a 70 inch Sharp TV which I haven't turned on since I turned on the projector. I added speakers to improve the sound and painted a wall to use as a screen. I purchased 20 dollar 3d glasses and the 3d is excellent but I am not a fan of the active 3d. I use Amazon all the time and never do reviews, but $350 for this projector is an excellent buy. I was planning on buying a 80 inch tv, so this purchase saved me thousands.
customer_reviews.author: Steve H

customer_reviews.title: Bright projector
customer_reviews.text: I had another Viewsonic that died after about 3 years. So didn't want to spend alot. This is a bright projector, and has very little fan noise if at all. There is also no filter to clean which was a pain with my other projector. The only con is that it doesn't project a very big screen. I had the projector some 5 feet away from the screen and it only projected a screen equivalent to a 47" or 50" screen. My older projector would be only two feet away to create that big a screen. So if you are looking to use for home theater, think about the projector placement.
customer_reviews.author: bubba202

customer_reviews.title: not as good as they say!
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality and the colors are rather good, however, the "screen door" effect is very noticeable and distracting. Picture watching a very large standard definition tube tv through a screen door to picture in your mind what you should expect. I was so impressed with this unit at first but after a while it's flaws took away from my viewing experience so I returned it for a true 1080p unit. Night and day differences between them. If you can, spend a little more on a better unit. If this is all you can afford, it's a good unit for the price and does have a nice picture.
customer_reviews.author: guy

customer_reviews.title: Great prjector for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Did a huge amount of research in this price point. Have had 5+ projectors over the last 10-15 years and this is a good one. The pixels however are visible and I am very upset about that. Low quality images for sure but once you're watching, you forget about it. I will say this projector is very bright and I like the remote, small and compact with soft rubber buttons. Works well near or far, key works well on an angle too. 3d works well with my ps4. Throw is great, fan is quiet... all in all I am happy with this at the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Lutz

customer_reviews.title: Cheap projector with a million $ view
customer_reviews.text: Happy with it, my kids use it with xbox, blu-ray, sat tv and apple tv, everything looks awesome. We hooked a Sony surround to it, sounds great now. Have our own home theater in the basement now. Bought the bracket to hold it in the ceiling- makes it so much easier than trying to find a stand for it that will clear everyone's head. Speakers on it stink- be prepared to buy a sound bar. Get an HDMI switching box so you can hook everything up with just one HDMI high speed cord to the projector. Save yourself a ton of frustrations.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This projector is lightweight. It gives a pretty good picture. I have not tried the 3D settings as of yet. The sound is not the BEST, sounds like a cellphone on speaker. So, unless you're sitting right next to it, you won't hear it. I have used it outside on the 14 foot inflatable and had a great picture. The kids enjoyed it a lot. For the price, you will enjoy it for casual/leisure viewing with the family.
customer_reviews.author: gglocklear

customer_reviews.title: Great unit for the price
customer_reviews.text: I coach high school speech and debate and I bought this to show powerpoints, web sites and play videos. It excels at all three. Very bright, even in a classroom where I can't block the windows. I've used lots of projectors before, but this is the first one I spent my own money on and I'm very satisfied. My only complaint, as others have said, is the audio portion is useless. If you have an HDMI feed, you need to take the audio out and run it into a separate amplified speaker. Not a big deal to me, but be aware. I have no problem giving a 5-start endorsement.
customer_reviews.author: John Wolnisty

customer_reviews.title: All TVs must die!!  Bigger is better, and to hell with everything else!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best purchase of 2014 for me. Awesome!! All TVs must die!! This is so much bigger, and more affordable than TVs that it is ridiculous. Never again to TVs unless in a small space. I use this on a 120 inch spandex screen all the time. I like this so much I setup a 20X10 foot white tarp screen outside that is fun to use once in awhile. You can buy a 23$ 3D pair of glasses from another company that works with this projector, so you don't have to buy their expensive 3D glasses. Bigger is better, and with this product cheaper is better also.
customer_reviews.author: Herbert Gartner

customer_reviews.title: A terrific value. Problem-free performance so far.
customer_reviews.text: I use this nearly everyday. Projecting from my laptop, projecting the playstation, date nights, netflix. Not a single issue. I keep my blinds closed and don't have a problem seeing the projection during daytime. Perfectly problem free for the year that I've owned it. It doesn't have all the features of other projectors. You may have to prop some bills or books under it for fine adjustment but that's really no big deal at all. Like all projectors less light equals better clarity.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Using for home movie projection. it is in a room that is approximately 20'. The image is clear, and brightness is good, even during the daytime with a bay window and translucent shades. I do not experience any 'rainbow' except when I move my eyes quickly. Setup was extremely easy, and there are enough options on the projector to make it easy to configure to exactly what you need. The projector is not loud, and is easily ignored, even when sitting right next to it. The front stand leaves a little to be desired, but no major issues. Remote control works fine. A good buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price, yes get it
customer_reviews.text: Great for a starter projector, I've had mine for a couple years now for movies and a lot of PS4......a lot. Not as sharp as a quality $$$ t.v. Or as colorful but I'm being picky. But everyone is a fan of it and since I've had Couple neighbors go buy 1. Simple, easy and straight forward starter projector for t.v., movies and video games, it's has high lumens but not top top tier contest ratio but for the price it's perfect. I have almost 3,000 hours on the unit and bulb and I don't have 1 complaint or issue.
customer_reviews.author: J.R. W.

customer_reviews.title: com/gp/product/B007KA07YM/ref=cm_cr_ryp_prd_ttl_sol_52 ) and it was the best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in case our son's birthday party rained out (along with projection cloth  ) and it was the best purchase ever. The party wasn't rained out, but having a cool place for the kids to relax inside and watch Lego Movie on a twelve foot screen was a huge hit. The picture quality is great - I am even considering using this for our Super Bowl party instead of the 55" 1080p flat screen!
customer_reviews.author: KMJ Esquire

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this product! We wanted something fun and different for our newly finished basement. Great picture on a painted wall with just primer--however we are buying a gallon of "Paint on Screen" just to make it that much better. We just bought a 3D ready Blue Ray player, and plan to get the active 3D glasses just to have on hand. Streamed movies/TV look great. We weren't sure we could do a projector when we are so used to 4 large flatscreens in the house but we are very impressed for the price. GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price but resolution is low
customer_reviews.text: The projector is easy to use, set up, fairly quiet and has a strong light. The one thing prevents me from giving 5 stars is that it's resolution is really low. 800x600 pixels is okay for movies but for demonstrations it's not quite sufficient. The specifications, unfortunately, kind of hiding this by only mentioning SVGA, instead of the actual picture resolution. Because of the low resolution if the picture is projected to a large screen then you can see each individual pixels. Which is not a huge issue but it makes it not so natural to look.
customer_reviews.author: Laszlo

customer_reviews.title: ... all of projectors but it gets the job done nicely. Ive had it for a few weeks and ...
customer_reviews.text: Its not the be all end all of projectors but it gets the job done nicely. Ive had it for a few weeks and use it every weekend to watch movies but mostly use it for gaming. There is some pixelation with small text though but not to the point of being non readable. You will need more than 15 ft if you want to get large than 84 in picture with it. This is my first projector but I have friends with worse quality ones. Beside small text, the difference between this and an hdtv isnt an issue.
customer_reviews.author: SpiritSaiyan

customer_reviews.title: Brookstone DLP preferred by me to this unit.
customer_reviews.text: I tried this unit and the Brookstone. I kept the Brookstone because for my needs, it's better. The view sonic is brighter, so for anything but dark rooms, it wins. It does create a lot of heat. I'm in a small office and that was not acceptable. They both are a little noisy, but if you can sit far away from the units, no problem. The picture on the Brookstone, though darker, looks more like a movie should look.The Veiw sonic, even with it's adjustments still looks less cinematic. I returned the Viewsonic. It's not bad, but I did prefer the Brookstone of rite's small size, lack of heat, and more cinematic picture.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Hogan

customer_reviews.title: I can even see the screen during the day!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best decisions iv made. Haven't had it for that long, but works great and I can even see the screen during the day with the windows and lights on! Grant you, the screen is a lot better/brighter at night. Wont ever buy a TV for the living room again-I plan on keeping this projector around for a long time. Better than expected, and it was shipped very securely. Tip: Point it directly at the wall, not at an angle
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: I have had this projector for almost a year now. We enjoy watching movies and football on it as well as some TV. I have it set up on 100" screen. Picture quality is good not the best but over all for the money you can't beat it. It's super bright so even when the lights are on you still get a good picture. If you sit right in front of the screen you can see the pixels kinda but that's like 2 feet away. 4 ft back it's very clear and really gives you that movie theater at home.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Hundreds of Hours in, THIS IS AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely incredible piece of technology! I will never buy a TV again! I have this mounted in my living room, and it throws a six foot diagonal screen in beautiful HD! I play from HDMI in various computers, and it works perfectly. You can project onto a white wall, and the effect will be perfect (even in the daytime). I bought a DIY screen and haven't even used it. Again, I cannot stress enough how much I love this projector. HIGHLY recommended. NOTE: Get speakers if you don't have them, the sound on this thing is total crap, but I never use it anyway!
customer_reviews.author: Evan Petrone

customer_reviews.title: Good projector, but emits SO MUCH HEAT
customer_reviews.text: This projector works well, but it emits SO MUCH heat that I can't use it in a room with the door closed without also having air conditioning running...it really is A LOT of heat (more so than other projectors that I have experienced)...
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Grat projector!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with this purchase! The reason I wanted a projector was to have a place I could watch TV or movies without waiting for some sport events or kids programs to be over....I was tired to wait for my turn!! Since I have my own office/room in the house, instead of buying another tv and pay for an extra cable box, I bought this projector which, once connected to my computer, let me watch anything on Direct TV, live or recorded AND all the movies I want from my Amazon Prime membership! The picture is HD and looks great! Best idea ever!!
customer_reviews.author: Margie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price and incredible 3D
customer_reviews.text: The other reviewers are right, this projector is amazing for the price. I was concerned with how it would look at 1080 but it detects and displays beautifully. I got about a 100" screen out of my wall space and it looks fantastic both in HD and SD. And finally the 3D is incredible! Bought some light weight active glasses and the effects are as good as the 3D in the theaters. If you've ever wanted to try a giant theater "wall" at home, get this projector. After seeing how it performs you won't believe it is as cheap as it is.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Grumley

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'd had another projector for about five years by the time I decided to upgrade. I was nervous, I didn't really like the one I got originally but felt stuck with it, and didn't want to make that mistake again. I'm glad I listened to everyone on Amazon, this is a great little projector at a fantastic price. Good colors, works fairly well even in not-total darkness, easy to set up. I wish it had a horizontal keystone option but so be it (if it does, someone please tell me).
customer_reviews.author: E. Skipp

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking for an awesome projector for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Cannot rave about this projector enough. I'm a college student with 2 roommates and this projector has COMPLETELY changed everything about our room. The picture quality is absolutely phenomenal, especially for the price, and we have had zero issues since buying it back in August. The crispness of the quality is, again, phenomenal. If you are looking for an awesome projector for a great price, look no further
customer_reviews.author: Mike Yoshino

customer_reviews.title: I am glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality is great. I have hooked it up to my Prism TV box, blue ray, DVD player, and laptop and it works great. We set it up in our driveway with the 120 inch Spandex screen and my grandkids come over along with some of the neighbor kids. The neighbors have suggested we have movie night on Friday nights and they'll supply the treats. We are already planning for Monday night football this fall for the adults. We plan on using this for Halloween and Christmas as part of our displays.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome projector for the $$$
customer_reviews.text: For the money this is an awesome projector. We use it in the basement to watch movies and play xbox. The picture quality is great for not being HD. I read many reviews and watched reviews on YouTube before purchasing and I wasn't disappointed at all. Only downside for me is there isn't a zoom on this. You'll need to determine where you want to mount it and project the picture before determining the screen size. I made my own screen so it was easy to get it the right size. There are plenty of YouTube videos on how to make your own screen cheap too.
customer_reviews.author: Brian H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: 100% satisfied. My wife was skeptical but she purchased it as my Christmas gift almost 2 years ago anyway. Set it up in our basement and WHAM!!! Instant theater! Since then we have changed that room into a home theater room. Built a screen with cloth from Amazon and added Harmon Kardon computer speakers with a subwoofer. We watch movies and our favorite TV shows down there year round. Our daughters are athletes and the theater room is a favorite. Couldn't be more satisfied. A+
customer_reviews.author: C. Henry

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality but sound lacking if used for home theater.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after having to send back a different brand projector, Digital galaxy, because it magically stopped working after less than a week of light use. I have been very pleased with the Viewsonic brand. I use the projector as my primary home television hooked up to a Roku player for streaming movies and Netflix. The picture is large, bright, and clear. The internal speakers are lacking for this purpose which is to be expected but has an external port for an external speaker hookup compatible with any of the leading sound systems on the market. Plug in some quality speakers and you will have the best home theater in the neighborhood.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Ward

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't tell the difference
customer_reviews.text: Projector is beyond expectations. I'm a huge movie buff and was debating between this one and a more expensive one and chose this one. I have the special edition of Titanic in 3D and I have to tell you, I cannot tell the difference between this projector and when I saw it at the theatre in 3D. I also purchased the 100 inch screen. Perfect! I also tried it on a 16 foot wall and again, great quality. I purchased the SainSonic rechargeable shutter glasses ssz-200DBL and they work flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Dal V

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Projector!
customer_reviews.text: Projector is awesome. Wanted a projector mainly to connect to my laptop to watch sports and movies. Did a lot of research and based on price and feedback/reviews i got this one. Couldn't be happier. Picture and brightness are amazing. Only minor issue i have is the throw distance isn't great. Meaning, i was hoping to get a nice size screen (maybe 100 in) from 11 ft, needs a lot more then that to reach a nice 120 inch. other then that its a great buy. For the price and product its a win-win.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice picture. Low resolution by today's standards.
customer_reviews.text: Nice, bright picture with excellent contrast and colour reproduction. The focus is maybe too good however, given the low (800x600) resolution, as I can quite easily see the individual pixels on the screen when I'm watching. If you're super-fussy about your image quality, I recommend going for the higher-resolution (1024x768) XGA version, but otherwise it's a brilliant unit.
customer_reviews.author: Cadnr

customer_reviews.title: Plug and play!
customer_reviews.text: Worked as advertised. No problem with the hookup and it worked first time with ease. Don't have to be technical to be able to use it. Personally I do know a little about computers, but almost no knowledge is needed to make it work. With this price range, you can't expect fancy features, but it does provide a clear pictures with your laptop or computer.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Wong

customer_reviews.title: Very nice...
customer_reviews.text: I took a gamble when I ordered this projector and this is my first one. What I can tell by my experience with this project (had it for over a year) is that the quality seems extremely well for the price you pay. I have no complaints on this projector and I use it almost every weekend (backyard movies, inside movie theater, gaming, ect.). I would recommend this projector to anyone who wants to start off slow and not jump right into expensive projectors area.
customer_reviews.author: Skynet_187

customer_reviews.title: PJD5134 SVGA DLP
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one back in April and after trying out couple movies and figured out how to set the image perfectly rectangle on the wall. Folks , lets me tell you this is the best and awesome 3D projector. I love it. The price for this unit is reasonable and suitable for everyone. couple important thing need to know about the projector: Set the projector dead center to the screen. Buy correct HDMI cable , it will transfer a good image to your eyes Buy a 3D blu ray player. You will never regret. You can turn any 2D movies into 3d movies. The combination will give you a good entertainment theater at home.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Tu

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this set.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a 3D ready projector but did not want to pay an arm and a leg. I was surprised at how light the unit was and still able to offer such quality beam. I mounted it with my VideoSecu bracket and it's running great. The 800x600 resolution was a compromise on the cost but I did a prez with some PPT decks and nobody complained. I would get an official mount bracket for this in retrospect because I had to do a lot of fiddling around to fit a 4 point frame into a triangular base, oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Herman Rengifo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for small presentations.
customer_reviews.text: We have had this projector for over two years and it works as advertised. My only peeve is the lack of other import ports. It relies on HDMI cable which is fine but often people bring laptops without the necessary adaptor. We use this in a room about 15+ feet from the screen and it is bright enough for everyone to see.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Forrest "Mac User"

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Projector !!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome !! Absolutely love it.. Been able to use it with out TV, satalite, computer, and will use with Xbox once we get the right cable...great picture quality and that is with just using it with a white sheet hung on our wall...pucture is great even when we have the lights on..a few months back I ordered a surround sound speakers that can be used with out TV , Xbox, and computers, I run out sound through this and it totally give the effect of being at the movies... At this point I don't have not one thing negative to say...we received the product very quickly.. LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great starter projector!
customer_reviews.text: Great little projector! Though I wouldn't recommend relying on the built in speaker too much, turn it up too loud and it buzzes. Other than that the 3D on this thing is amazing. This is the first time I've experienced 3D and I am surprised at how it pops off the wall so well with a projector with this low of a price. Definitely recommend if looking for a projector on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchfl

customer_reviews.title: Lines in the image.
customer_reviews.text: I almost for got to review this product until I went to review others. I hated it. Soon after I hooked it up, I noticed very visible lines in the screen.
customer_reviews.author: R.

customer_reviews.title: Looking for reasonable and reliable projector, buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Projector. I wanted to buy a projector for theater experience at home. Then I got eye on this projector. First I thought SVGA (800 X 600) projector would not show proper crisp image, or should I go for XGA or WXGA resolution. But at the end I took a chance and bought it, considering the fact of cost. And wow!! I am happy to make that decision. Amazing clarity, the pictures are pixelated, but you will hardly notice it if you get engrossed in the movie. It does have 3.5mm audio o/p, to which I connect wireless sound bar via Bluetooth transmitter The 3D quality is also too good. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashish Chavan

customer_reviews.title: Not so much
customer_reviews.text: This projector is a bit hard to navigate the menus and the lamp life is not very good. I was projecting images from my computer onto canvas, and after two hours the projector made a funny pop noise and my image suddenly turned deep red. I will be contacting the seller/company for a replacement...but leaning towards a refund.
customer_reviews.author: G. Jernigan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing picture, Very bright, Good price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so my family could watch movies under the stars on our rooftop terrace. I also bought a portable screen to go with it. The combination has been a BIG hit! I connect my iPad over HDMI and play Netflix, and connect the projector's audio out to an old iPod audio dock. Movies look great and sound great! Gone are the days of blurry or faded out projectors. Get one of these and start enjoying the big screen!
customer_reviews.author: R. Fink

customer_reviews.title: Love my Viewsonic 3D Blu-Ray Ready Projector
customer_reviews.text: Wow What a great Purchase! I couldn't be any happier with such a great projector. You will need to purchase a 3D Blu-Ray player and the 3D glasses that you can get for low prices. The 3D Glasses that are needed are inexpensive and most on the market will work with this projector. The 3D viewing is to me better than going to the Cinema. So if your wanting to add 3D too your Home theater This would be a great projector to invest in.
customer_reviews.author: mic

customer_reviews.title: Logo shows up when changing the channel
customer_reviews.text: Nice picture. The only issue I have is that when you change the channel, it goes to the "ViewSonic" logo screen for a solid 5 seconds almost every time. Imagine trying to change the channel on your cable box, and all of a sudden there's a big blue ViewSonic logo that won't go away until the channel is "detected". It's pretty annoying since you should just be able to change the channel.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great Lumens brightness is very good researched projectors for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Lumens brightness is very good researched projectors for a long time made this purchase and it gives a crisp bright picture. I use it for backyard movie nights and have never been disappointed. I use it with the blowup screen has all the inputs for any type of show I cant say enough good things about this projector envy of the neighborhood
customer_reviews.author: Donald Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Better than expecterd
customer_reviews.text: Ordered because great price and no additional equipment, other than 3D Blue Ray Player and Active Shutter Glasses, required. I use a King size bed sheet for screen, giving a 10ft wide movie. Projector is appx 20ft from screen, and seating is appx 16ft from screen. Very bright with great 3D effects, using PGD-250 3D active shutter glasses by Quantum 3D. After reading reviews on 3D active shutter glasses, I went with these as some of the other glasses seemed to have problems, and the price on these glasses was right. I would recemond this setup to anyone wanting a home system.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Better than expected. I will never buy a tv again. We hang a sheet against the house and watch movies by the fire. Really bright and great picture. Sound isn't very loud so I recommend getting a speaker for it. We also use it inside and just project it onto the bedroom wall. Even though the walls are actually light tan and have texture the picture is still great. So happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: mistressofmirth

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Buy it you won't regret it
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Buy it you won't regret it. The 3-d is amazing. I got it as an Easter present for my kids last year and set it up to make sure everything worked as soon as I got it. I was so excited that I woke my son up to show him and ruined the surprise. This works great with the sainsonic glasses by the way. I was having trouble deciding which to buy and am glad I went with them. Seriously buy it, movie night will never be the same again!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Right Out of the Box!
customer_reviews.text: I am technology challenged -- so I was VERY thrilled when this arrived. I connected the power cord, attached an HDMI cable to it from my computer, and voila! This came to life and automatically set everything up and I was in business. Perfect! Very bright, sharp, and clear image. I use this in classroom teaching and also I brought it home to watch large screen football game. Go Seahawks! Fantastic. Get it! Don't hesitate.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Kehr

customer_reviews.title: WORTH EVERY PENNY
customer_reviews.text: I RARELY write reviews, but this projector is worth it! For the price, it cannot be beaten. I was sure it was a hyped product, but the quality of the image is fantastic! I was blown away. It looks as good as a real movie theater to me. Does the picture look like that of a $2000 unit? Of course not, but it looks to be worth far more than $350! I am VERY pleased with this projecor. I don't care about the weak speakers as I am going to use external speakers. You will not be sorry with this purchase. I am thrilled!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Long

customer_reviews.title: Hard to beat for the buck!!
customer_reviews.text: I use it for classroom presentations and it's a knockout. What a great projector. Excellent colors and brightness. I don't even dim the lights. I hook it to a laptop and use 1024x768 setting even though it says 800x600 will give better results. Not true. I know it's only svga, but as a presentation projector, it's hard to beat for that price. Setup was a snap and it's awesome. Would not consider it for home theater use if your a real videophile, but for presentations, it's hard to beat for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: William J. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Fresh Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I loved this projector dearly, but our tenure together was short like a summer wind in Oregon. Winter came too soon with ViewSonic PJD5134. Before I even got a chance to replace the bulb, the piece of junk started "critically overheating" and could not be repaired. I'd love to return this defective thing and have a re-do, but time changes everything and electronics are a business of fresh garbage and this projector is no exception - not in prodcution anymore Yours truly, Critically Overheating
customer_reviews.author: Kean Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We are using this product in our sanctuary, which holds about 200 people. We use it for Sunday School presentations via Power Point. It hooks up to the laptop and works beautifully. We have a projection screen, like the ones used in elementary school, for viewing and the fonts and pictures are clear and crisp. We used it to watch a movie and the it was just like being at the theater. I would highly recommend this projector.
customer_reviews.author: C. Laud

customer_reviews.title: Awesome projector!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe the picture that comes out of this thing.... It's not 1080p... but believe me the quality is as close to it. I bought 3d glasses for it (Okeba active shutter 3D glasses)... and i was blown away with the 3D quallity. The only down side is the sound. Like everybody else who reviewed this, just get a separate sound system. I got a Bose Soundlink Mini to go with it and i got myself a personal home theater Awesome for games, movies and all the other stuff you can think for it! All i know is that this projector exceeds expectation for how much it costs A very happy buyer here! :)
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great for projection mapping
customer_reviews.text: Great clear picture! Used this for a demo 3D projection mapping/ VJ college project. Attached is a video of this projector being used over 50ft away outside on the roof of a car. Check it out[...]

customer_reviews.title: Awesome projector.
customer_reviews.text: Love this projector. If you don't want to break the bank on a more expensive projector this is the one for you. Easy to use and quality is great. You will need speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly A. Adair

customer_reviews.title: We have truly enjoyed the ViewSonic
customer_reviews.text: We have truly enjoyed the ViewSonic. We bought it to replace an ancient projector. We use it to display movies outdoors--not heavy use. Even with just a white sheet as the screen, the videos looks great. The 3000 lumens allows us to use the projector even before it is totally dark out. We haven't tried the 3D feature as yet. Most of the time the built in speaker is enough however attaching a powered speaker is no problem. For the money (and for our use), it is a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: AWM

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This projector is awesome for an entry level device! It can route sound to external speakers, which is a must. It's not HD, so it can't compare to the $700+ group of projectors, but for me this is just fine. You get lost in the movie anyway so you don't notice that it's not theater-qualty (it's probably the difference visually between 720 and 1080, it's definitely not perfect but it's much better than you'd think). The one I bought was refurbished and received it defective with lines on the screen so that had to be returned, but the brand new replacement I got is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Sean M. Word

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for movie nights on our yearly beach vacations and for movie nights at camp. It was more expensive than I initially wanted to spend but after reading reviews of the cheaper ones and some more expensive ones we decided to get his one. The screen we ordered was too big to take on a long trip so at the beach we just used a sheet. Even with just a white sheet as a screen the picture was beautiful. We pulled the projector far enough back that the viewing area was as wide as a king size sheet. The picture was crisp. The colors were vivid. It worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Angela D Ersher

customer_reviews.title: Great Projector
customer_reviews.text: This has been great so far. Only used it twice and its worked great. Nice hi def picture and I just put it on the wall. When I set up the screen I bet it will be excellent. Makes needing a big screen TV unnecessary. Im at high altitude and run this on that setting and it runs amazingly cool. Very good so far.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.K. II

customer_reviews.title: Died after only 130 hours
customer_reviews.text: Died after only 130 hours on it due to shutting off after being on for ~1min and reporting a temperature problem. Searched online, and tried what was suggested, but all signs point to a defective temperature sensor which can't be remedied. Very disappointed in the product - I'll be buying a replacement from a different company.
customer_reviews.author: Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Perfection Projection
customer_reviews.text: I bought the ViewSonic Projector so I could give presentations without the hassle of borrowing someone else's projector. It is so easy to use, just hook it up and it projects. I haven't mastered all the things you can do with the remote but the picture is clear, the minor adjustments easy and it is light weight. I also plan on using it outside to project home movies at night for parties. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Avolese

customer_reviews.title: Football never looked so good.
customer_reviews.text: My order arrived astonishingly fast, the projector was easy to set up, and the picture quality is fantastic. We have the sound running through a PA and speakers, and it's an instant home theater. I'm planning on buying a 3D blu-ray player next - we were watching football with a light on and fireplace going, and it was still as bright as the picture on our LCD TV in a room with ambient light.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Really impressed with the picture quality!!
customer_reviews.text: We brought our down to Costa Rica and were impressed with the picture quality. Really happy with this purchase and highly recommend it to anyone looking for an inexpensive projector. We love it. I would like it to be a tad bit smaller and would have looked at the LED unit that is priced around $380 or so. Still we are 100% happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: B. Long

customer_reviews.title: Excellent projector

I ordered this along with the visual apex 90" projector screen and the phillips bluRay 3D dvd player with surround sound system. For less then $600.00, I turned my living room into a movie theater. It can only be used in a dark setting, obviously, but as a once or twice a month portable way to watch the big games on a big screen with a sinle hdmi and power hook up, would buy this again in a second.

customer_reviews.author: Ronni W.

customer_reviews.title: Great entry-level / general use device

I knew the resolution of the machine going in, but expected it would be just a little better than it actually was when I saw it in person, but otherwise a great projector. Agree with other reviews that the sound through the device is poor at best, but what can you expect from a built-in projector speaker? Plan on integrating a separate sound system if you need quality sound.
customer_reviews.author: eShopper

customer_reviews.title: Get this one

customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic,  My little theater in my den

It's a fantastic starter projector and I would highly recommend it. The only complaint is that it does only have one HDMI input.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Works as Expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product for my company team room. Competitively priced and exactly what we needed. Setup took less than 15 minutes and the picture and color quality is great. At the price point and with the features it has, this was a great buy. We have had it in use for approximately 6 weeks and it gets used about 5-10 times per week.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It delivers
customer_reviews.text: It does everything that I need a projector to do. amazing picture with bluray dvd player. Watching football games and action movies on this is just so much fun. All my friends are jealous of me. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Pratik

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great choice. I was very skeptical about purchasing this projector but I'm glad I did!
